name: Shisha no Tani
startIntroPart1: I will coat this world lead and replace the seas with red.
startIntroPart2: I will make them kneel before my very eyes, I want to see them beg for forgiveness.
attacked: You stand in the way of the 4th Reich, the you stand in the way of your own demise.
defeated: ... I'm sorry for my cruelty, this death was long awaited byt those around me. You may take my life now, I have failed as a leader, I have failed as a general, I have failed as an innovator, I have failed as a person and I have failed to be a human. I may now rest in a grave I have dug myself, and I can join my parents once and for all. Thank you.
introduction: I will be closely watching your every move.
neutralLetsHearIt: W-w-wait w-what!? W-who told you about my rape fetish?!
neutralYes: I only agree because it benifits me.
hateHello: You wish to speak to me?
hateLetsHearIt: Hey! Quit talking about the rape fetish and start talking about relevant matters!
Fine, I'll give you the time of day.
afterPeace: You want a reward for our treaty? ... S-sex? ... I guess we can have sex, but only because you asked...
tradeRequest: This is merely for my benifit.
uniques: Quantity of strategic resources produced by the empire +[+100]%
